variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Subject id

variable.name: screen_id
variable.description: Visit id

variable.name: age
variable.description: Subject age at time of collection

variable.name: racial_background
variable.description: What is your ethnic or racial background?
variable.value: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

variable.name: education
variable.description: What is the highest level of education you have completed?

variable.name: employment
variable.description: What is your employment status?

variable.name: marital_status
variable.description: What is your current marital status?

variable.name: age_first_period
variable.description: How old were you when you got your first period?

variable.name: still_have_periods
variable.description: Do you still have periods?

variable.name: periods_regular
variable.description: Are your periods regular?

variable.name: number_days_from_last_period
variable.description: What was the first day of your last menstrual period (MM/DD/YY)?

variable.name: number_days_between_periods
variable.description: How many days usually pass between your periods?

variable.name: number_days_period_last
variable.description: How many days does your period last?

variable.name: sanitary_product_used_on_period
variable.description: What do you use when on your period?

variable.name: flow_status
variable.description: How would you describe your flow?

variable.name: bleeding_between_periods
variable.description: Do you experience bleeding or spotting between periods?

variable.name: bleeding_frequency
variable.description: How regular is your bleeding or spotting?

variable.name: bleeding_description
variable.description: How would you describe your bleeding or spotting?

variable.name: age_when_periods_stopped
variable.description: How old were you when your periods stopped?

variable.name: take_hormone_therapy
variable.description: Are you taking Hormone Replacement Therapy?

variable.name: sexually_active
variable.description: Are you currently sexually active (sex within past 6 months)?

variable.name: had_sex_last_48hours
variable.description: Had sex within last 48 hours?

variable.name: vaginal_lubricant_last48hours
variable.description: Used vaginal lubricant in last 48 hours?

variable.name: gardasil
variable.description: Have you received the HPV vaccination (Gardasil, Cervarix)?

variable.name: probiotics_frequency
variable.description: How often do you take probiotics?

variable.name: herbal_remedies_frequency
variable.description: How often do you take herbal remedies?

variable.name: calcium_supplement_frequency
variable.description: How often do you take calcium supplements?

variable.name: vitamins_frequency
variable.description: How often do you take vitamins?

variable.name: doctor_yeast_infection_medication
variable.description: Have you taken doctor-prescribed yeast infection medication in the past 6 months?

variable.name: days_since_most_recent_use_doctor_yeast_infection_medication
variable.description: Most recent date since you used a doctor-prescribed yeast infection medication

variable.name: counter_yeast_infection_medication
variable.description: Have you taken over-the-counter yeast infection medication (ex: Monistat) in the past 6 months?

variable.name: days_since_most_recent_use_over_counter_yeast_infection_medication
variable.description: Most recent date since you used a over-the-counter yeast infection medication

variable.name: insulin
variable.description: Have you taken Insulin in the past 6 months?

variable.name: days_since_most_recent_use_insulin
variable.description: Most recent date you took insulin

variable.name: oral_steroids
variable.description: Have you taken oral steroids in the past 6 months?

variable.name: days_since_most_recent_use_oral_steroids
variable.description: Most recent date you took oral steroids

variable.name: metronidazole_taken
variable.description: Have you taken metronidazole in the past 6 months?

variable.name: metronidazole_days_since_use
variable.description: Days since most recent use of metronidazole

variable.name: penicillins_taken
variable.description: Have you taken penicillin in the past 6 months?

variable.name: days_since_use_penicillins
variable.description: Days since most recent use of penicillin

variable.name: cephalosporins_taken
variable.description: Have you taken cephalosporins in the past 6 months?

variable.name: days_since_use_cephalosporins
variable.description: Days since most recent use of cephalosporins

variable.name: nitrofurantoin_taken
variable.description: Have you taken nitrofurantoin in the past 6 months?

variable.name: days_since_use_nitrofurantoin
variable.description: Days since most recent use of nitrofurantoin

variable.name: quinolones_taken
variable.description: Have you taken quinolones in the past 6 months?

variable.name: days_since_use_quinolones
variable.description: Days since most recent use of quinolones

variable.name: macrolides_taken
variable.description: Have you taken macrolides in the past 6 months?

variable.name: days_since_use_macrolides
variable.description: Days since most recent use of macrolides

variable.name: sulfa_taken
variable.description: Have you taken sulfa in the past 6 months?

variable.name: days_since_use_sulfa
variable.description: Days since most recent use of sulfa

variable.name: tetracyclines_taken
variable.description: Have you taken tetracyclines in the past 6 months?

variable.name: days_since_use_tetracyclines
variable.description: Days since most recent use of tetracyclines

variable.name: other_antibiotics_taken
variable.description: Have you taken other antibiotics in the past 6 months?

variable.name: days_since_use_other_antibiotics
variable.description: Days since most recent use of antibiotics

variable.name: smoking_status
variable.description: Have you smoked more than 100 cigarettes in your lifetime?

variable.name: age_startsmoking
variable.description: At what age did you start smoking?

variable.name: current_smoke
variable.description: Do you currently smoke?

variable.name: cigarettes_per_day
variable.description: During the last 30 days, on average, how many cigarettes have you smoked per day?

variable.name: age_stopsmoking
variable.description: If you don't currently smoke, what age did you stop smoking?

variable.name: alcohol_12months
variable.description: How many occasions have you had alcohol in the last 12 months?

variable.name: alcohol_30days
variable.description: How many occasions have you had alcohol in the last 30 days?

variable.name: alcohol_pastweek
variable.description: How many occasions have you had alcohol in the past week?

variable.name: alcohol_onesitting_12months
variable.description: On how many occasions have you had four or more alcoholic drinks in one sitting in the last 12 months?

variable.name: alcohol_onesitting_30days
variable.description: On how many occasions have you had four or more alcoholic drinks in one sitting in the last 30 days?

variable.name: alcohol_onesitting_pastweek
variable.description: On how many occasions have you had four or more alcoholic drinks in one sitting in the past week?

variable.name: vigorous_physical
variable.description: On average, during the last year, how many times per week did you take part in vigorous physical activity

variable.name: moderate_physical
variable.description: On average, during the last year, how many times per week did you take part in moderate physical activity

variable.name: light_physical
variable.description: On average, during the last year, how many times per week did you take part in light physical activity

variable.name: vigorous_physical_frequency
variable.description: On average, during the last year how long did the vigorous physical activity last each time?

variable.name: moderate_physical_frequency
variable.description: On average, during the last year how long did the moderate physical activity last each time?

variable.name: light_physical_frequency
variable.description: On average, during the last year how long did the light physical activity last each time?

variable.name: yogurt
variable.description: On average, during the last year, how often did you eat yogurt?

variable.name: milk
variable.description: On average, during the last year, how often did you eat milk?

variable.name: cheese
variable.description: On average, during the last year, how often did you eat cheese?

variable.name: icecream
variable.description: On average, during the last year, how often did you eat ice cream?

variable.name: other_dairy
variable.description: On average, during the last year, how often did you eat other dairy products?

variable.name: lowfat_diet
variable.description: Have you been on a low-fat diet in the past year?

variable.name: lowcarb_diet
variable.description: Have you been on a low-carb diet in the past year?

variable.name: lowcalorie_diet
variable.description: Have you been on a low-calorie diet in the past year?

variable.name: vegeterian_diet
variable.description: Have you been on a vegetarian diet in the past year?

variable.name: vegan_diet
variable.description: Have you been on a vegan diet in the past year?

variable.name: glutenfree_diet
variable.description: Have you been on a gluten-free diet in the past year?

variable.name: prescribed_diet
variable.description: Have you been on a physician-prescribed diet in the past year?

variable.name: other_diet
variable.description: Have you been on other diet in the past year?
